form.label: Zeek SIP (V2.0)
form.description: V2 Additions: Dashboard Now Rides The Zeek_Suite Datamodel

search.query:
| tstats summariesonly=f count from datamodel=Zeek_Suite.SIP by SIP.uri, SIP.user_agent, SIP.seq, SIP.id_orig_h, SIP.id_resp_h, SIP.request_from | rename SIP.uri AS uri, SIP.user_agent AS user_agent, SIP.seq AS seq, SIP.id_orig_h AS id.orig_h, SIP.id_resp_h AS id.resp_h, SIP.request_from AS request_from
| where !like (seq, "63104 OPTIONS") AND !like (seq, "-")
| sort -count | appendpipe [| stats count | where count=0 | eval "uri"="No Instances Found"] | rename uri AS URI, user_agent AS "User Agent", seq AS "Request Type", id.orig_h AS Source, id.resp_h AS Destination, request_from AS "Destination Info"

| tstats summariesonly=f count from datamodel=Zeek_Suite.SIP by SIP.status_code, SIP.status_msg, SIP.warning, SIP.id_orig_h, SIP.id_resp_h, SIP.response_from | rename SIP.status_code AS status_code, SIP.status_msg AS status_msg, SIP.warning AS warning, SIP.id_orig_h AS id.orig_h, SIP.id_resp_h AS id.resp_h, SIP.response_from AS response_from
| where !like (status_msg, "-")
| sort -count | appendpipe [| stats count | where count=0 | eval "status_code"="No Instances Found"] | rename status_code AS "Status Code",status_msg AS Status, warning AS Message, id.orig_h AS Source, id.resp_h AS Destination, response_from AS "Destination Info", count AS Count
